name: Horacio
description:
HI!

It's my first game i've ever made (And obviously first time using Unity)

You have to push the enemies at the flashing sectors of the map, but don't touch them, because they can kill you!

Its very probable that i wont update the game, but maybe in a future when i have way more experience, but for now i think its ok!

It doesnt have any bosses (yet?)

Controls:

WASD = Movement

Left / Right Arrow = Punch
